name: BLACKCAMEL ENERGY LTD
goal:
Producer and supplier of sustainable tropical timber.

Producer of high quality lumber and furniture components to worldwide buyers.

Pioneer of timber legality standard and sustainable forest management in Nigeria, West Africa.

Promoting encapsulation of carbon(timber products) into construction so as to help in fighting against climate change and reducing carbon emission by locking up sequestered carbon.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Climate Change: Locking up sequestered carbon through our product thereby reducing carbon emission.

Rural areas development: Providing clean water and quality sanitation in rural areas where we source our raw materials.

Sustainability: Pioneering and promoting sustainable forest management in Nigeria, West Africa.

Employment: Providing jobs to locals where we source thereby alleviating them from poverty.
